attributes.review: my experience with this app was horrific and disrespectful on so many levels!  i opened the app and it was slow ashell and i was confused to how there were no pictures of Kanye anywhere. i find this extremely biased and overall insensitive to my beliefs. also i don‚Äôt see how being sponsored by Cheetos is relevant to the presidency, it‚Äôs offensive. i suggest just deleting the app and put a end to this nonsense! -a fellow Kanye supporter

attributes.review: At first, when I found out that there had been another app released by a racist old white man, I was ecstatic. However, something about getting text alerts by someone who is keeping his son hostage really turned me off. Along with this, the app design is awful and the red, white, and blue color scheme is not aesthetically pleasing. If an app is to represent my country, do it better please

attributes.title: Honest review from a trump supporter

attributes.review: i hate this app with a burning passion. it literally possessed me for 3 days straight. not only did it take like a day to download, it seriously possessed me. as soon as it downloaded i was so excited to use it to support the orange god trump. but as soon i opened an image appeared that was traumatizing that i couldn‚Äôt stop staring at. i felt weird after the image finally went away. the app never even loaded because it‚Äôs so slow so i just forgot about it. for the next three days i had no idea what i was doing and woke up in a mental hospital. turns out that the image of our orange god possessed to go murder democrats for 3 days. this app made me mentally insane and i‚Äôm giving it 1 star.
attributes.title: made me mentally ill

attributes.review: So I attempted to download this app and after taking almost 4 full days to download, it began to crash immediately after opening...ad walls began to consistently pop up and it began to corrupt other apps on my phone as well...my phone then began to get hot and CAUGHT ON FIRE...I tried to put it in rice, I also attempted to turn it on and off but it was burnt to a crisp...I then had to go and buy an entirely new phone! Therefore DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I tried opening it but then i started getting weird messages, i ignored it and went to sleep. In fear i threw the orange and shook off the spiders. After that i had trouble sleeping, around 6am I finally got to fall asleep but had the worst nightmare ever, trump getting re elected.
